channel.title: Clean Architecture on Software Craftsman
channel.description: Recent content in Clean Architecture on Software Craftsman

item.title: Go Microservice with Clean Architecture: Application Layout
item.description: Go Microservice with Clean Architecture: Application Layout I created a Microservice with Go and gRPC and tried to figure out what is the best project layout, which can be used as a template for my future projects. I came from Java background and found myself keeping struggling between Java and Go idioms, which are quite different. I wrote a series of articles about decisions and trade-offs I made when working on the project.
